title: The Centurions - New OCE LoL Community
body:
Hello fellow Summoners!

We’re looking at creating a new community within OCE for all to come and play!

**Who are we?**

We are The Centurions, a new gaming community within OCE. We’re all for encouragement, playing and meeting new people, playing with old friends, challenging one another to climb the ranks of League - but are mainly here to have FUN!

**What do we do?**

League of Legends :)

We would like to facilitate a healthy gaming community within OCE and rid the region of toxicity! We’re wanting to boost the skills of the OCE region and be known as a force to be reckoned with!

We’re organizing multiple 5 man rosters/teams (known as “Pillars”) to train together, play together and climb the ladders of League together.

Currently, each fortnight, a new training session will be released for all Pillars to work on in scrims or normal games. 

We’re also hoping to run Tournaments when there are enough Pillars within the community!

We have a Discord server - which is the means we use for communicating.

We’re also in the middle of building a website! 

**Who are we looking for?**

We are looking for summoners that abide by the Summoner’s Code!

We’re wanting to create a fun and enjoyable environment with no ragers, trolls or toxic players.

We’re looking for players across all differents skill levels and abilities - Bronze 5 through to Challenger!

**Want to be apart of the action?**

If The Centurions is a community you want to be apart of, click on the link below or copy and paste the link into your browser to apply for a spot in The Centurions.

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd76BOrAW3Vz4L1MKzuu0SzZ04uBiXJV1_HtPL1KQSZnltx2Q/viewform

We’re also looking for anyone that is wanting to give back to the community in the way of Coaching, Analysts, Casters, Content Creators (Articles, etc).

We’re also looking for people with specific skillsets such as Photoshop, Video editing, Websites, Coding, etc.

Thanks for your time guys and looking forward to seeing you **ALL** on the Rift!
